author: pburba
msg: Minor doc string fix for svn_client__merge_path_t.
(svn_client__merge_path_t): Note that we always describe the target
of a merge regardless of whether it has explicit mergeinfo.

author: hwright
msg: Merge r30644 and r30668 from trunk:
Make --record-only merges record and elide mergeinfo on subtrees.
Record only merges without this functionality are a lot less useful.
30644 will conflict if the r30633 group is not applied first.

author: markphip
msg: * STATUS: Vote for r30644, r30668, approving.
